key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks due to evolving federal and state banking regulations
Cybersecurity and fraud risks including data breaches and system failures
Increased long-term debt raising concerns about financial leverage
Competitive pressures from larger national banks, smaller community banks, and fintech disruptors
controversies: Regulatory enforcement actions and adverse legal outcomes
Legal disputes such as the Citigroup Inc. v. City Holding Co. case
Rising short interest indicating investor skepticism
environmental_issues: Increased focus on sustainable lending as part of ESG initiatives
social_issues: Community development programs as part of ESG initiatives
governance_issues: Ongoing challenges in complying with evolving regulations
Potential intellectual property and branding challenges highlighted by legal disputes
